column4: hey quinn -- your beryl completely hangs on edgy with the latest 8.30 ati drivers -- although XGL was working fine with them.
so now I'm using it with the non ati.com drivers.
yeah on the vanilla ones it works great :) I just wish AMD would stop trying to shrink processors for two hours and fix ATI's drivers.
welcome to vista I'm about to throw my vista machine through the window ;)
